reviews.review_msg:
Pretty cool guy with experience on what he's talking about.

Pros:
Well structured Canvas
Responsive

Cons:
Unclear grading criteria
Some flip flopping on coursework
Ridiculous word count limits, yet wants great detailed answers

honestly went into this class thinking i would hate it but since day 1 brett's been a super caring prof and funny with his dad jokes. he seems like he genuinely likes teaching the class! textbook is provided, assignments super clear and marked fairly, flexible office hours, easy to understand lecs. debating taking 221 just bc i rlly like this class

Not the best lecturer, but very thorough in explaining concepts. I understood everything he was teaching. He might not be very clear when you ask him questions on the spot though. Easy courses and fair marker. He's a nice guy.
